titles.title: A resolution designating December 3, 2019, as "National Phenylketonuria Awareness Day".
A resolution designating December 3, 2019, as "National Phenylketonuria Awareness Day".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution designates December 3, 2019, as National Phenylketonuria Awareness Day. (Phenylketonuria or PKU is a rare, inherited metabolic disorder that can cause intellectual disability and other neurological problems.)
